Title: Removes emergency medical services from the limit on real property tax levies by local governments
Summary: Removes expenditures for emergency medical services from the limit on real property tax levies by local governments.
LawCode: Amd ยง3-c, Gen Muni L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general municipal law, in relation to removing emergency medical services from the limit on real property tax levies by local governments
